channel.title: Cloudpods – release/3.6
channel.description: Recent content in release/3.6 on Cloudpods

item.title: Docs: v3.6.22
item.description:
发布时间 2021-09-07 14:04:37

cloudpods

仓库地址: https://github.com/yunionio/cloudpods

40 commits to cloudpods - v3.6.22 since this release.

Bug Fixes (39)

  • resolve permission issues for samlusers and quotas (aec0affa1b, Qiu Jian)
  • avoid double counting when compute networks nic count (07aab1daea, rainzm)
  • routes to private prefixes should be distributed on private nic (9290e6fbd7, Qiu Jian)
  • inter-vm traffic limited by eip bandwidth limit (5bbe39749a, Qiu Jian)
  • dhcp classless route encoding error (288c0d5612, Qiu Jian)
  • server migrate network to a vlan network (5fff71781f, Qiu Jian)
  • baremetal: increase ipmitool reboot sleep wait time (18c8973c6d, Zexi Li)
  • baremetal: inject mac to cmdline (53a6960478, Zexi Li)
  • baremetal: inject mac when admin nic found (89e8b1fdda, Zexi Li)
  • baremetal: reindex nic (#12087) (17b80d528f, Zexi Li)
  • climc: add version list command (171792d6ce, Qu Xuan)
  • cloudcommon: avoid service exit when etcd unreachable (dc37976b50, Zexi Li)
  • cloudid: avoid sync clouduser twice (1bd783aef8, Qu Xuan)
  • cloudid: azure attach enabled subscription policy (916fa8d4b0, Qu Xuan)
  • esxiagetn: keep compatible with the lower version vcenter when copying the disk (5a34578f94, rainzm)
  • host-deployer: XFS uuid冲突 无法 mount (8e582878cd, panda)
  • keystone: appsrv listen multi port failed cause of race condition (372b2ff6a1, Zexi Li)
  • monitor: fix resource details can’t show monitor metric (4c668de666, zhaoxiangchun)
  • region: return sql error (3fbb27b8ef, Qu Xuan)
  • region: delete dirty network (8da9634767, Qu Xuan)
  • region: azure vm disk size (b4f4bd7502, Qu Xuan)
  • region: baremetal server reuse ip address condition (3f6db673b5, Zexi Li)
  • region: return region sql error (e86e95faf0, Qu Xuan)
  • region: lb resource count (43ab653d49, Qu Xuan)
  • region: not set baremetal is_maintenance when action is start (dc819e77fc, Zexi Li)
  • region: sync openstack multi zone storages (0025975b4e, Qu Xuan)
  • region: prohibit resizing the disk of a esxi vm with instance snapshots (c58c36eab8, rainzm)
  • region: avoid get openstack hostid panic (935d73f330, Qu Xuan)
  • region: sync with multi worker (b9bb7679eb, Qu Xuan)
  • region: adjust the query range corresponding to the alarm strategy (8a4f0cecd1, rainzm)
  • region: allow guest network zero bandwidth limit (0abdd5195d, Zexi Li)
  • region: baremetal server resued address nic count should be subtracted (f461726f58, Zexi Li)
  • region: resource count for cachedimages (d70235fd11, Qu Xuan)
  • region: enable zstack allocate ip by itself (c6177d7228, Qu Xuan)
  • region: aliyun rds network sync (ca844df22f, Qu Xuan)
  • region: sync aliyun classic network ip addr (40c020e768, Qu Xuan)
  • region: baremetal spec condition (2141af918d, Zexi Li)
  • region: raise GetNamedNetworkConfiguration error (052499e4eb, Zexi Li)
  • scheduler: make option EnableQuotaCheck work (5b9a383e43, rainzm)

Features (1)

  • region: check whether the esxi host is ip or domain name (8959f6675f, rainzm)

cloudpods-operator

仓库地址: https://github.com/yunionio/cloudpods-operator

1 commits to cloudpods-operator - v3.6.22 since this release.

Others (1)

  • update vendor (82417e29, Qiu Jian)

notify-plugins

仓库地址: https://github.com/yunionio/notify-plugins

1 commits to notify-plugins - v3.6.22 since this release.

Bug Fixes (1)

  • worwx: return correctly when fetch contact (a33198a, rainzm)

ocadm

仓库地址: https://github.com/yunionio/ocadm

1 commits to ocadm - v3.6.22 since this release.

Hack (1)

  • use 99 years certs (0ebffdd8, Zexi Li)

sdnagent

仓库地址: https://github.com/yunionio/sdnagent

2 commits to sdnagent - v3.6.22 since this release.

Bug Fixes (2)

  • tc: aware of ingress qdisc (0c4b0a26, Zexi Li)
  • tcman: delete all qdiscs before batch replace (93ff1144, Zexi Li)

/v3.6.21…v3.6.22

Bug Fixes (23)

  • add codes to switch bridge of ovs port (ce86205aa6, Qiu Jian)
  • add cloudroot as system account, so as not using normal user id (0250318839, Qiu Jian)
  • baremetal: compatible with SN empty of MegaRaid (2a927ec7a7, Zexi Li)
  • baremetal: use ipmitool power reset when redfish power on error (9f0193574e, Zexi Li)
  • build: baremetal arm64 build (ad98d01e9e, Zexi Li)
  • host-deployer: detect UEFI supported not correct (bca3ca19e0, Zexi Li)

  • keystone: user not found error fix (395f74ffd4, tb365)
  • keystone: avoid sql error (58709b21a3, Qu Xuan)
  • monitor: alert policy use ownerId when update (74e00b4322, zhaoxiangchun)
  • region: allocate server eip without hostwire restrict (f5b68f0571, Qu Xuan)
  • region: sync storage before syncing host in syncOnPremiseCloudProviderInfo (ba1202fe16, rainzm)

  • region: return rds networks info (ebdd4ee2a1, Qu Xuan)
  • region: rds network sync (9a1e0d26eb, Qu Xuan)
  • region: disable public cloud ip pre allocate (7594720f0a, Qu Xuan)
  • region: handle the error of RequestGuestCreateAllDisks (522aada8b7, rainzm)
  • region: sync auzre subscription health status (e624f422d4, Qu Xuan)
  • region: remove debug info (f4c2799815, Qu Xuan)

Feature (1)

  • allow server switch network without service interruption (cc44b3a6f2, Qiu Jian)

Features (4)

  • host: aware of kubelet eviction config (47d7b434ba, Zexi Li)
  • host: add openEuler rootFs driver (f2b0684160, Zexi Li)
  • hostdeployer: change UserAdd to CheckOrAddUser (665dd2c0d0, rainzm)
  • hostdeployer: change the way fo GetLoginAccount in windows (b9fc69576b, rainzm)

Others (2)

  • minor fixes (55fe3fa3bb, Qiu Jian)
  • update OWNERS (468453951d, Zexi Li)

sdnagent

仓库地址: https://github.com/yunionio/sdnagent

1 commits to sdnagent - v3.6.20 since this release.

Agent (1)
